1: the Fan-bearer on the Right Side of the King

--------------------
Text: Nakhtmin:  His titles during the reign of Tutankhamun included "the true servant who is beneficial to his lord, the king's scribe," "the servant beloved of his lord," "the Fan-bearer on the Right Side of the King," and "the servant who causes to live the name of his lord."
Triplets:<Nakhtmin
the true servant who is beneficial to his lord
2:
--------------------
<Text: Nakhtmin:  These titles were found on five ushabtis that Nakhtmin offered as funerary presents for pharaoh Tutankhamun.>
Triplets:<Nakhtmin
